description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. First person basketball! Enter the arena for a 3-point shootout, or try the arcade cabinet for frantic 2-point hoops. Play against the clock for a place in the global scoreboards, or against a friend in split screen mode. Featuring realistic physics, smooth 3D visuals, compelling audio, and intuitive gameplay for all kinds of players.
description.short: First person basketball! Enter the arena for a 3-point shootout, or try the arcade cabinet for frantic 2-point hoops. Play against the clock for a place in the global scoreboards, or against a friend in split screen mode. Featuring realistic physics, smooth 3D visuals, compelling audio, and intuitive gameplay for all kinds of players.
